coded_answer.p: I am writing this letter to show whomhow disappointed am II am with the musical show "Over The Rainbow".
First of all, I was expecting to see Danny Brook starringacting but I felt very disappointed when a different actor appeared.
When I saw the advertisement offor the show it was written that the show willwould startedstart at a half past seven but it started at a quarter past eight.
Then when I was buying my ticket I asked for a discount but they weren't available.
When the show finished I was enitingintending to visit the theatre restaurant but it was closed.

I was expecting a lovely and perfect evening out but it was the most disapointeddisappointeddisappointing experience I have ever passedhad. So because of this horrible evening I want to ask for my money back.
Modern technology havehas been changing the human life since the first manyman was born.

When I wake up I take a shower using eletricityelectricity then I prepare my breakfast in the oven then I go to school by bus, when I arrive at home I put my lunch in the microwave thanthen I watch t.v.TV and do my homework using a pen, when. When I come back from jiu-jitsu I eat something that was cooked in the oven then I go to bed.
About a milleniummillennium ago every thingeverything was different; the people didn't have electricity, they didcooked their food on the fire and they didn't have pens.
Comparing these tootwo realities the reader can notice that modern technology changedhas changed very much our daily lifeour daily life very much.
